entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. My name is Ashley. How can I help you today?
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I want to return something I bought.
I understand. I can certainly help you with a return. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's jane.doe@email.com. I want to return a VeloBand Pulse.
Thank you, Ms. Doe. I've located your order. I see you purchased a VeloBand Pulse. What's the reason for the return?
It's just not what I expected. I don't like the way it feels on my wrist. It's bulky. I thought it was more like a smart watch, but it's not. Can I return it or not?

I understand. Our standard return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase for a full refund. Let me quickly check the specifics of the VeloBand Pulse to make sure there are no exceptions.
Okay, Ms. Doe, I’ve confirmed you are eligible for a full refund under our 90 days return policy! No problem at all!
Really? Great! Because it's been about 15 days, I think. I was worried I was past the return window. That's a relief.

Yes, that falls well within our return window. To initiate the return, I will email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we will process your refund.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Will I get the refund back on my original payment method?

Yes, the refund will be credited back to the original method of payment. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account. Sometimes it takes longer than the stated 10 days depending on your bank.
Perfect. Thank you so much! I was really dreading this call, but you made it so easy. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome, Ms. Doe. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you again!
Have a wonderful day! Thank you for choosing VeloFit.
